price: Hasha! Hakika hao siku hiyo bila ya shaka watazuiliwa na neema za Mola wao Mlezi.
arabic: كَلَّآ إِنَّهُمۡ عَن رَّبِّهِمۡ يَوۡمَئِذٖ لَّمَحۡجُوبُونَ
footnotes: Hakika ni kweli kuwa hao wanao kadhibisha watazuiliwa siku hiyo rehema ya Mwenyezi Mungu kwa sababu ya maasi waliyo yachuma.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: kallā innahum ʿan rabbihim yawma-idhin lamaḥjūbūna
